OOC: Introducing my fourth and final character... for now. He wont actually reach the NBW for a few posts.

On a planet far in space and time from the Neo Beast Wars on Past-Earth there is cryogenics facility in a deep subteranian city. The system is very old. The power reserves are giving out. The computer beeps before sparks fly and it goes dead. Cryonic gas is escaping a chamber. Finally everything is silent.

Suddenly a hand slams against the cyrogenic chamber door, slowly pushing it open. An older man steps out but in good shape. He currently wears nothing but soon finds his "royal" robes. He looks into one of the blank computer screens struggling to find his reflexion. When he does he gasps. The freezing process has changed him. His once green skin is now pink, like a humans. His hair is white. Facial hair gone.

Man: Wh... What time is this? How long have I been frozen?

The man tries to find his answers but the computers tell him nothing. He knows where he must go. The answers and his life are no longer of this planet Nebulous. He will travel to Cybertron and Earth. Answers lie there.

The man smiles when he turns back to see a huge city buried down the cavern. The smile widens when he sees his special exo-skeletal suit layed out near by. The man puts the suit on, brushing it off to reveal a familiar purple symbol on the chest.

His name is Lord Zarak: former tyrant and ruler of The Hive which controled the planet Nebulous. He is also binary bonded to a Cybertronian based mechanoid shell known as Scorponok. This mortal man of flesh and blood is a Transformer. He is a DECEPTICON HEADMASTER!

Sometime later the planet rumbles as a city on the surface is destroyed. The Scorponok city, now in it's mobile mode blasts through the city and leaves Nebulous on a direct course for Cybertron.

To be continued...

 
---------------------------------

always stay connected to friends.
--0-1854138105-1184772467=:5990
